amendment.description: Amendment sought to add findings language noting that construction of the pipeline would permit a new source of oil exports to China and other nations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 112-181 to add findings language noting that construction of the pipeline would permit a new source of oil exports to China and other nations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murphy (CT) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 152 - 275 (Roll no. 644).
